new-script-ng-13

Today I'm going to be updating how I create blog posts, so its a little easier. Along with that, I'll be trying to upgrade this project to angular-13, which recently released.

Hopefully things go well!

other updates

Work has been busy, so I haven't had a chance to look into my other projects much, but I've had them in mind. I think continuing to update this portfolio is still one of my main priorities.
